action.content:
You are participating in a collaborative guessing game.
The goal is to find out whether this picture and another picture only I can see, are the same.
Please describe your image first. Then, I will provide my description and we can ask each other questions about the images to figure out whether they are the same. Now start your short image description with "DESCRIPTION:" followed by the description. Do not add anything else.

DESCRIPTION: The image shows a kitchen with white cabinetry and a central island. The island has glass-front cabinets and a plant on top. There are stainless steel appliances, including a refrigerator and an oven. The kitchen has a mix of recessed lighting and pendant lights. There is a round wooden dining table with a bowl of fruit and black metal chairs. The walls have floral wallpaper, and there are several plants around the room. The floor is wooden.

DESCRIPTION: A kitchen with white cabinets and a central island featuring glass-front cabinets. There are stainless steel appliances, including a refrigerator and an oven. The kitchen has a wooden floor and is decorated with floral wallpaper. There is a round wooden dining table with a bowl of fruit and black metal chairs. The lighting includes pendant lights over the island and a chandelier over the dining table. There are also potted plants on the island and in the corners of the room.
